articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Sony WH-1000XM6: Sony officially reveals colours, pricing and shipment dates of new wireless over-ear headphones ahead of schedule - Notebookcheck
articles.description: Sony has accidentally revealed the colours, pricing and shipment dates for its long-awaited WH-1000XM5 successors ahead of time. While the Sony WH-1000XM6 will cost significantly more in Europe and the UK than its predecessor, Sony should start shipping its l…
articles.content: Various leaks have underlined that only the WH-1000XM6 is forthcoming, too. Now, Sony itself has been caught confirming as much ahead of schedule. Seemingly spotted by The Walkman Blog, the store lis… [+496 chars]
